findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions multiSendTokens() and multiSendPercents() uses a loop to multitransfer, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.

findings.title: Non fixed solidity version
findings.description: Solidity version is not fixed. Contract uses operators that work different way on different solidity versions.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The function multiSendTokens() and multiSendPercents() uses a loop to multitransfer, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.

findings.title: Design Logic
findings.description: Low issues found in design logic of the contract
